title: Mesh Sync
description: Easily add as many skeletal meshes as you like to your character, save templates with Data Assets. Every mesh added with the Mesh Sync Component will sync from the server to all clients, no need to worry about replication.
longDescription:
Easily add as many skeletal meshes as you like to your character, save templates with Data Assets. Every mesh added with the Mesh Sync Component will sync from the server to all clients, no need to worry about replication.


Documentation • Playable Demo • Showcase Video


One Component

Mesh Sync provides a near plug and play experience, all the code is contained within one Actor Component, add it to your character and follow the setup in the documentation. Example Setups are also provided in the asset. Additionally, nodes within are commented.


Network Replicated

Built from scratch with network replication in mind. Working replication on both Player Hosted sessions and on Dedicated Servers. Optimized to have a low cost on both the server and clients. Every mesh is the same on the server and client.


Low Cost & Optimized

Having issues with memory usage in the editor? Soft references are used in all the Mesh Sync Data Assets to ensure it is only loaded into memory at play, minimize wait times when opening complex and detailed characters.


Endless Combinations

Add, mix and randomize as many meshes as desired, they will all by synced. Re-use the data assets across multiple characters.


Singleplayer

Even if you have a singleplayer project, this asset provides an easy to setup and configure method of implementing lots of various characters, randomize and add as many meshes as desired. Future proof your project, if you decide to add multiplayer support to your project in the future, with mesh sync you'll have an already configured setup ready to be used.


Summarized:

What does Mesh Sync do?

Mesh Sync is a component that uses Data Assets to provide a convenient way to configure characters, add as many meshes as you want, save them and re-use them for many possible combinations for characters. The Mesh Sync component then takes your input and makes sure everything is synchronized to every player, late-join is supported. Never worry about replication again, the component will take care of it, create templates and apply it to your characters. With the use of soft references and efficient replication, Mesh Sync is ready and optimized for your projects, documentation is included to aid in your first time setup.


Documentation • Playable Demo • Showcase Video

Many important functions and configurations are explained in the product documentation.


Support

Need help? No problem! I will do the best I can to help you through any problems you might face. Send a mail to the support e-mail at zeepSoftware@gmail.com and I'll reply as soon as possible.


If you like Mesh Sync, please leave a review! It helps out a lot. If you have feedback, I'd love to hear it as well.

With your feedback, I may even add in more features in the future.

  • Low Replication and Memory cost
